ygData.subject: Staff of Writhing/Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure if there s anyone here anymore, but if there is: I recently had an opporunity to aquire a staff of writhing in exchange for a crude stein.  As I m
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure if there's anyone here anymore, but if there is:
I recently had an opporunity to aquire a staff of writhing in exchange for a crude stein.  As I'm level 12, the staff won't be proc'ing for quite some time.  Also, there are lots of new weapons out there, many with stat enchancing effects.  I also have a dragoon dirk.
 
My options:
use both
sell the dragoon dirk, as the staff is slightly better; what's its current value  (I'm on Innoruuk)?  guessing-- 50pp?
sell the staff, as I can (probably) get more money for it; what's its current value?   guessing--200pp?
 
second, what's the best way to get another stein?  I've heard people hunting bouncers often give them away; what zone are they in?  Ferrott?  Oggok?
 
Thanks,
Laina, Necromancer of the 4th Circle
Innoruuk
